reason.raw: Talked to @mikaelarguedas and we'll try a different approach
reason.html: Talked to @mikaelarguedas and we'll try a different approach

description.html:
@mikaelarguedas , this should prevent the pickup checkpoint from being completed before the "go to pick up" checkpoint.

Also note that pull request #71 makes the guest be spawned further inside the area.

In any case, it is important that the robot completes the checkpoints in order. The room_info service should help by providing the exact bounds within which the robot should be to complete the first one.

title.raw: Advertise /unadvertise pick-up service as checkpoint starts / ends
title.html: Advertise /unadvertise pick-up service as checkpoint starts / ends

In any case, it is important that the robot completes the checkpoints in order. The room_info service should help by providing the exact bounds within which the robot should be to complete the first one.
